Welcome to Minima
 
 The complete blockchain solution
 
 You now have access to a decentralised value and information transfer network unlike anything you have seen before
 
 An open application ecosystem known as the MDS - MiniDAPP System - allows you to interface easily with this new paradigm
 
 Value, Information and Application - everything you need to do anything you want
 
 We are still working hard to fit all the pieces together but we hope you enjoy this taste of Freedom
 
 The Minima Team

Making a backup of your Minima node is VERY important.
 
 On Minima you are the only one who looks after your coins.
 
 Currently - backups are only valid for 1-2 months.
 
 The files are about 500Kb.. so not very big.

You can easily restore from a backup.
 
 Once you have restored Minima will shutdown.
 
 Please re-open Minima and your data will have been restored.
